entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
